colophon.para: Google Drive was used for optical character recognition.
DockBook authored in Oxygen XML Editor.
Transformation into PDF, EPUB and HTML by DocBook XSL stylesheets.
XSLT Processor: Saxon. XSL-FO Processor: Apache FOP.
Build is done using Apache Maven using the docbkx plugin.
Source repository is hosted by GitHub.
Website is hosted by GitHub Pages.
